alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 4:41PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Camden and Glynn Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 441 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Darien to 6 miles southwest of Jekyll Island. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brunswick, St. Simons Island, Dock Junction, Country Club Estates, Sea Island, Jekyll Island, Harrietts Bluff, Boys Estate and Dover Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn
